outputs.name: all_u
outputs.description:
A text string indicating all possible units
that can be plugged into _from_u and _to_u.

inputs.name: _values
inputs.description: Values to be converted from one unit type to another.

inputs.name: _from_u
inputs.description: Text indicating the units of the input _values (eg. 'C')

inputs.name: _to_u
inputs.description: Text indicating the units of the output values (eg. 'K')

name: LB Unit Converter
description:
Convert a value or list of values from one unit to another.
-
